Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/23rd
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Exp & J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are rrtd via Lake Shore Dr, 31st, Michigan, then resume their normal route, due to blockage nr Lake Shore Dr/23rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 31st, Michigan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/23rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
